original: evaṃ śakrādayaḥ sarve tridaśāḥ sāpsaro gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: evam śakra ādayaḥ sarve tridaśāḥ sa apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ

original: pūjāṅgāni samādāya draṣṭumenaṃ mudā yayuḥ // SvayambhuP_2.38 //
analyzed: pūjā aṅgāni samādāya draṣṭum enam mudā yayuḥ
tathā agni dharmarājaḥ naiṛtaḥ varuṇaḥ marut

original: śrīdo bhūtādhipaścaivaṃ sarve lokādhipā api // SvayambhuP_2.39 //
analyzed: śrīdaḥ bhūtādhipaḥ ca evam sarve loka adhipāḥ api
sva sva parijanaiḥ sārddha mahā utsāhaiḥ pramoditāḥ

original: evaṃ svayambhuvaṃ caityaṃ saṃdraṣṭuṃ samupāyayuḥ // SvayambhuP_2.40 //
analyzed: evam svayambhuvam caityam saṃdraṣṭum samupāyayuḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ mahā rājaḥ gandharvaiḥ saha moditaḥ
saṃgīti vādana utsāhaiḥ saha enam draṣṭum āyayuḥ
viruḍhakaḥ mahā rājaḥ kumbha aṇḍa sahitāḥ mudā
svayambhuvam tam ālokya mudā vanditum āyayuḥ
virupākṣaḥ upi nāga indraiḥ sarvaiḥ nāga adhipaiḥ saha
ratna pūjā upahārāṇi dhṛtvā enam draṣṭum āyayuḥ
kuveraḥ yakṣa rājaḥ u pi yakṣaṇībhiḥ samanvitaḥ
nānā dravya upahārāṇi dhṛtvā enam draṣṭum āyayuḥ
vajrapāṇiḥ ca guhya indra sarva guhyaka saṃyutaḥ
divya bhogya apahārāṇi dhṛtvā enam draṣṭum āyayuḥ
drumaḥ sarvaiḥ saha hi ānanaiḥ
tūrya saṃghoṣaṇa utsāhaiḥ sahinam draṣṭum āyayuḥ
tathā sarva arthasiddha ākhyaḥ sarva vidyādhara adhipaḥ
divya pūjā upahārāṇi dhṛtvā enam draṣṭum āyayuḥ
garuḍaḥ pakṣi rājaḥ u pi sarvaiḥ pakṣi gaṇaiḥ saha
sva sva ṛddhi śrī mahā utsāhaiḥ enam saṃdraṣṭum āyayuḥ

original: evaṃ siddhāśca sādhyāśca vasavaśca grahā api /
analyzed: evam siddhāḥ ca sādhyāḥ ca vasavaḥ ca grahāḥ api
sarvāḥ tārā ganāḥ ca api sarvāḥ ca api apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ
evam daitya adhipāḥ sarve sva sva parijanaiḥ saha
mahā samṛddhi prātsāhaiḥ sahasā samupācaran
evam loka adhipāḥ sarve daśa dikṣu vyavasthitāḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā taṃ svayambhūtpannaṃ vandituṃ sahasācaran // SvayambhuP_2.51 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam svayambhu utpannam vanditum sahasā ācaran

original: sarve 'pi te samāgatya dṛṣṭvā taṃ jagadīśvaraṃ /
analyzed: sarve te samāgatya dṛṣṭvā tam jagat īśvaram
saṃharṣita āśayāḥ dūrāt praṇatvā samupācaran
tatas te jagannātha sarve bhyarcya yathākramam

original: aṣṭāṃgaiḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā prābhajanta samādarāt // SvayambhuP_2.53 //
analyzed: aṣṭāṃgaiḥ praṇatim kṛtvā prābhajanta samādarāt
kecid davya sugandhaiḥ tam prābhilipya abhajat mudā
kecid nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kecid dhūpaiḥ manoharaiḥ
kecid ca puṣpa mālābhiḥ kecid ca divya cīvaraiḥ
kecid ca dīpa mālābhiḥ kecid ārati dīpanaiḥ
kecid divya amṛtaiḥ bhogyaiḥ kecid divya auṣadhaiḥ api
kecid nānāvidhaiḥ divya ratna alaṃkāra ābhūṣaṇaiḥ
kecid chatra dhvaja evali vyajanaiḥ ca vitānakaiḥ
kecid saṃgīti saṃvādyaiḥ mṛdaṅga muraja ādibhiḥ

original: kecit tauryatrikai vaṃśaiḥ śaṃkhaiḥ śṛgaiśca kecana /
analyzed: kecid vaṃśaiḥ śaṃkhaiḥ śṛgaiḥ ca kecana
ka āhāraiḥ ca tathā kecid
tāla ādi ghana vādyaiḥ ca bherī ānaka mardalaiḥ
tathā nānāvidhaiḥ maḍḍuḥ ḍiṇḍima jharjhara ādibhiḥ
kecid nṛtyaiḥ ca gītaiḥ ca hāhākāraiḥ ca kecana
evam nānāvidha utsāhaiḥ prābhajan stam jinālayam
kecid pradakṣiṇāni eva kṛtvā bhajan sahasraśas
kecid ca dhāraṇī vidyā japa stotra ādibhiḥ mudā
evam nānā prakāraiḥ te sarve lokāḥ dvija ādayaḥ
śraddhayā samupāśritya prābhajan stam svayambhuvam
etad divya mahā utsāhaiḥ saṃpravṛttim prasāritām

original: śrutvā sarve sabhālokā vismayaṃ samupāyayuḥ // SvayambhuP_2.63 //
analyzed: śrutvā sarve sabhā lokāḥ vismayam samupāyayuḥ
tat samīkṣya mahāsattvāḥ ratnapāṇiḥ purogataḥ

original: śikhinaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sāñjalirevamabravīt // SvayambhuP_2.64 //
analyzed: śikhinam tam munim natvā sa añjaliḥ evam abravīt
bhagavan yat mahī sarvā kampitā divyam utsavam

original: prasāritaṃ ca kasyedaṃ hetu tat samupādiśa // SvayambhuP_2.65 //
analyzed: prasāritam ca kasya idam hetu tat samupādiśa
iti saṃprārthitam tena sudhiyā ratnapāṇinā

original: sa śikhi bhagavān paśyan ratnapāṇiṃ tamabravīt // SvayambhuP_2.66 //
analyzed: sa śikhi bhagavān paśyan ratna pāṇim tam abravīt

original: sādhu śṛṇu mahāsattva yat sarvā calitā mahī /
analyzed: sādhu śṛṇu mahā sattva yat sarvā calitā mahī

original: divyotsāhaiḥ pravṛttaṃ ca taddhetuṃ saṃnigadyate // SvayambhuP_2.67 //
analyzed: divya utsāhaiḥ pravṛttam ca tad hetum saṃnigadyate
tat yathā atra asti bhū loke uttarasyām himālaye
tatra ratna maye padme saroja rāja karṇṇike
svayam eva samutpannaḥ dharmadhātu jina ālayaḥ
tad utpanne mahī sarvā racitā saṃpramoditāḥ
sarvatra api śubha utsāham prāvrarttate bhava ālaya
tam samīkṣya maheśāna brahmā śakra ādayaḥ marāḥ

original: grahāstārāśca siddhāśca sādhyā vidyādharā api // SvayambhuP_2.71 //
analyzed: grahāḥ tārāḥ ca siddhāḥ ca sādhyāḥ vidyādharāḥ api
mahā ṛṣaḥ ca sarve sa vismaya pramoditāḥ

original: sarve lokādhipāścāpi daityā nāgāḥ khageśvarāḥ // SvayambhuP_2.72 //
analyzed: sarve loka adhipāḥ ca api daityāḥ nāgāḥ khaga īśvarāḥ
yakṣa kinnara gandharva guhyaka rākṣasāḥ apiḥ

original: etatprabhṛtayaḥ sarve samīkṣya taṃ svayaṃbhuvaṃ // SvayambhuP_2.73 //
analyzed: etad prabhṛtayaḥ sarve samīkṣya tam svayaṃbhuvam
saṃharṣitāḥ samāgatya prabhajante mahā utsavaiḥ
etat pūjā mahā utsāha saṃpravṛttiḥ prasārita
etasya idam mahat bha nimittam saṃprajāyate

original: ityādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śikhinā saṃnisaṃmya saḥ // SvayambhuP_2.75 //
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭam muni indreṇa śikhinā saḥ
ratnapāṇi mahāsattvāḥ sa vismaya pramoditaḥ
su prabuddha mukha ambhojāḥ mahā saṃharṣita āśayaḥ
bhūyas tam śikhinam natvā sa añjaliḥ eva bravīt
bhagavan tat hi jānīyāt yat manaḥ me samīcchate
tad anujñām pradatvā atra saṃprasādayatum arhati
aham api jagat śāstaḥ svayambhuvam tam īśvaram
śraddhayā samupāśritya prabhajāmi mahā utsavaiḥ

original: iti saṃprārthite tena śrutvā sa bhagavāñchikhi // SvayambhuP_2.79 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthite tena śrutvā sa bhagavān śikhi
ratnapāṇim mahāsattvam saṃpaśyan evam ādiśat

original: kulaputra prayāhi tvaṃ yadyāśu bodhimicchasi // SvayambhuP_2.80 //
analyzed: kula putra prayāhi tvam yadi āśu bodhim icchasi
śraddhayā samupāśritya prabhaja tam jina ālayam

original: ye tatra samupāśritya bhajeyuḥ śraddhayā mudā // SvayambhuP_2.81 //
analyzed: ye tatra samupāśritya bhajeyuḥ śraddhayā mudā
te āśu prāpya saṃbodhim sambuddha padam āpnuyuḥ

original: ityādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa ratnapāṇi niśamya saḥ // SvayambhuP_2.82 //
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭam muni indreṇa ratna pāṇi niśamya saḥ

original: sāñjalistaṃ muniṃ natvā muditaḥ prācarat tataḥ /
analyzed: sa añjaliḥ tam munim natvā muditaḥ prācarat tatas
tatas tena saha aneke bodhisattvāḥ jina ātmajāḥ
śrāvakāḥ bhikṣavaḥ ca api bhikṣuṇyaḥ ca api upāsikāḥ
upāsakāḥ bhaktimantaḥ vratinaḥ puṇya lālasāḥ
ṛṣayaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ca api yatayaḥ yoginaḥ ca
tīrthikāḥ tāpasāḥ ca api nirgranthāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: rājānaḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā amātyā mantriṇo janāḥ /
analyzed: rājānaḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ amātyāḥ mantriṇaḥ janāḥ
śilpinaḥ vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāḥ ca api mahājanāḥ
paurāḥ jānapadāḥ grāmyaḥ tathā anya deśa vāsinaḥ
evam anye api lokāḥ ca saddharma guṇa vāñchinaḥ

original: sarve tatra mahotsāhaistena sārddha mudā carat /
analyzed: sarve tatra mahā utsāhaiḥ tena sārddha mudā carat

original: evaṃ sa ratnapāṇistaiḥ sarvaiḥ lokai samanvitaḥ // SvayambhuP_2.88 //
analyzed: evam sa ratna pāṇiḥ taiḥ sarvaiḥ lokaiḥ samanvitaḥ
pūjā aṅgāni samādāya mudā acarat

original: evaṃ sa pravarañchrīmān sarvāṃllokān vinodayan // SvayambhuP_2.89 //
analyzed: evam sa pravaran śrīmān sarvān lokān vinodayan
sahasā tatra prāgatya dadarśa imam jina ālayam

original: dṛṣṭvainaṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ muditaḥ samupāsaran // SvayambhuP_2.90 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā enam sa mahā sattvaḥ muditaḥ samupāsaran
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya praṇatvā prābhajat mudā

original: evaṃ sarve 'pi te lokāḥ sahāyāstasyamaharṣayaḥ // SvayambhuP_2.91 //
analyzed: evam sarve te lokāḥ sahāyāstasya mahā ṛṣayaḥ
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya mahā utsāhaiḥ mudā abhajan

original: evaṃ te sakalā lokā stutvā japtvā ca dhāraṇī // SvayambhuP_2.92 //
analyzed: evam te sakalāḥ lokāḥ stutvā japtvā ca dhāraṇī
pradakṣiṇāni kṛtvā uṣṭa praṇatvā prābhajat mudāḥ
evam anye mahāsattvāḥ bodhisattvāḥ jina ātmajāḥ
daśa digbhyaḥ samāgatya prābhajan imam īśvaram

original: ahamapi tadā tena sahetya ratnapāṇinā // SvayambhuP_2.94 //
analyzed: aham api tadā tena saha itya ratnapāṇinā
śraddhayā samupāśritya prābhajan imam īśvaram
etad puṇya anubhāvena bodhim prāpya kalau api
jitvā māra gaṇān sarvān dharmādhipaḥ bhavāmi aham

original: ye yesya samupāśritya bhajeyuḥ śraddhayā mudā // SvayambhuP_2.96 //
analyzed: samupāśritya bhajeyuḥ śraddhayā mudā

original: te te sarve 'pi saṃbodhiṃ prāpya syuḥ sugatā drutaṃ //
analyzed: te te sarve saṃbodhim prāpya syuḥ sugatāḥ drutam
evam mahattaram puṇyasya sevā samudbhavam

original: iti sarvai munīndraiśca samākhyātaṃ samantataḥ // SvayambhuP_2.98 //
analyzed: iti sarvaiḥ muni indraiḥ ca samākhyātam samantataḥ
yūyam api parijñāya bhajata asya samādarāt

original: munīndrā api sarve 'sya catuḥsandhyaṃ divāniśaṃ // SvayambhuP_2.99 //
analyzed: muni indrāḥ api sarve catuḥsandhyam divāniśam

original: dṛṣṭvā dhyātvā smṛtiṃ dhṛtvā prābhajantaṃ samādarāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā dhyātvā smṛtim dhṛtvā prābhajantam samādarāt

original: bhajanti sāmprataṃ sarve buddhāḥ sarve digāśritāḥ // SvayambhuP_2.100 //
analyzed: bhajanti sāmpratam sarve buddhāḥ sarve diś āśritāḥ

original: asya darśanamātreṇa praduṣṭā api pāpinaḥ // SvayambhuP_2.101 //
analyzed: asya darśana mātreṇa praduṣṭāḥ api pāpinaḥ
nirmukta pātakāḥ hi āśu bhaveyu nirmala indriyāḥ
tatas te nirmala ātmānaḥ niḥkleśaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: durgati naiva gaccheyuḥ kutrāpi hi kadācana //
analyzed: durgati nā eva gaccheyuḥ kutra api hi kadācana
saṅgatau eva saṃjātāḥ bhadra śrī sat guṇa āśrayāḥ
bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ bhaveyuḥ sugata ātmajāḥ
tatas te bodhi sambhāram pūrayitvā yathākramam
trividhām bodhim āsādya nirvṛtim padam āpnuyuḥ

original: iti natvā sadāpyasya kṛtvā darśanamādarāt // SvayambhuP_2.105 //
analyzed: iti natvā sadā api asya kṛtvā darśanam ādarāt
anumodya abhyanusmṛtvā dhyātvā anubhāvya sarvadā

original: nāmāpi ca samuccārya śraddhayā bodhivāchibhiḥ // SvayambhuP_2.106 //
analyzed: nāma api ca samuccārya śraddhayā bodhi vāchibhiḥ
yathāśakti prakarttavyā bhakti sevā sat ādarāt
iti ādiṣṭam muni indreṇa śrīghanena niśamyate
maitreya pramukhāḥ sarve sabhā lokāḥ prabodhitāḥ
tathā iti abhyanumodantaḥ dharmmadhātoḥ svayambhuvaḥ
śraddhayā samupāśritya saṃbhajitum samīcchire

original: atha sarvve sabhālokā dharmmadhātoḥ svayambhuvaḥ // SvayambhuP_2.109 //
analyzed: atha sarvve sabhā lokāḥ dharmmadhātoḥ svayambhuvaḥ
pūjā phala viśeṣāṇi saṃśrotum punar īcchireḥ

original: tanmatvā sa mahāsattvo maitreyaḥ sugatātmaja // SvayambhuP_2.110 //
analyzed: tat matvā sa mahā sattvaḥ maitreyaḥ sugata ātmaja
bhagavantam muni indrantam prārthayat eva mānataḥ
bhagavan asya pūjāyāḥ viśeṣa phala vistaram
sarvve ime sabhā lokāḥ śrotum icchanti sāmpratam
tat bhagavān samupādiśya pūjā phala viśeṣa tām
imām sarvān sabhā sīnām saṃbodhayitum arhati

original: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena maitreyeṇa niśamya saḥ // SvayambhuP_2.113 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthitam tena maitreyeṇa niśamya saḥ
bhagavān stān sabhā lokān sampaśyanā evam ādiśat

original: śṛṇudhvaṃ sakalā lokā asya pūjāphalaṃ mahat // SvayambhuP_2.114 //
analyzed: śṛṇudhvam sakalāḥ lokāḥ asya pūjā phalam mahat
viśeṣeṇa pravakṣyāmi sarve loka abhibodhane
pañcāmṛtaiḥ saha ambhobhiḥ saṃśobhita su nirmmalaiḥ
ye mudā snāpayanti imam dharmmadhātum jina ālayam

original: mandākinyāṃ sadā snātvā te viśuddhatrimaṇḍalāḥ // SvayambhuP_2.116 //
analyzed: mandākinyām sadā snātvā te viśuddha tri maṇḍalāḥ
divya sukhāni bhuṃjānaḥ prānte yāni jina ālayam

original: saurabhya dravyasaṃyukti yatra caityai svayambhuvi // SvayambhuP_2.117 //
analyzed: yatra
modayantaḥ jagat cittam dhūpayanti mudā sadāḥ

original: te sugaṃdhitasaumyāṅgā mānyā devā surairapi // SvayambhuP_2.118 //
analyzed: te sugaṃdhita saumya aṅgāḥ mānyāḥ devā suraiḥ api
śrīmantaḥ su sva saṃpannāḥ bhavanti ratna sannibhāḥ
pañca gandhaiḥ mudā yatra dharmmadhātoḥ jinālaye
lipta ārādhya samāśritya prabhajanti sat ādarāt
sapta ratna sametāḥ te bhadra śrī sat guṇa āśrayāḥ
sarvve lokāḥ hita udyuktāḥ bhavanti kṣitipa adhipāḥ

original: ye cātra munirājendrā vicitra cīvarāmbaraiḥ // SvayambhuP_2.121 //
analyzed: ye ca atra muni rāja indrāḥ cīvara ambaraiḥ
pravārya śraddhayā bhaktyā saṃbhajante samādarāt
te divya dṛṣya kauśeya ratna ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
su jñāḥ dharma adhipāḥ santaḥ bhavanti bhadra cāriṇaḥ

original: ye caimaṃ kusumaiḥ sarvvai jalajai sthalajairapi // SvayambhuP_2.123 //
analyzed: ye ca emam kusumaiḥ sarvvaiḥ jala jaiḥ sthala jaiḥ api
arccayitvā samāśritya saṃbhajante pramoditāḥ
mahīndra śrī samṛddhāḥ te śakra adhika prabhā anvitāḥ
bhadra śrī sukha saṃpannāḥ bhavanti bodhi bhāginaḥ
yat ca enam puṣpa mālābhiḥ racitābhiḥ manoharaiḥ
sarvva puṣpaiḥ pralambābhiḥ śobhayitvā bhajanti ca
bhavanti śrī samṛddhāḥ te dharmma kāmāḥ suradhipāḥ
sat kīrttiḥ guṇa saṃraktāḥ śubhagāḥ bodhi cāriṇaḥ

original: ye ca puṣpāṇi sarvāṇi mudātra sugatālaye // SvayambhuP_2.127 //
analyzed: ye ca puṣpāṇi sarvāṇi mudā atra sugata ālaye
avakīrya samārādhya bhajanti śaraṇa āśritāḥ

original: te 'pi devādhipā svarge gatā mahyāṃ nṛpādhipāḥ // SvayambhuP_2.128 //
analyzed: te pi deva adhipā svarge gatāḥ mahyām nṛpa adhipāḥ
mahat śrī guṇa sampannāḥ bhavanti bodhi bhāginaḥ
dhṛta sugandhi taila ādi saṃpradīptām tamaḥ upahām
jvālayanti mudā ye smin dharmmadhātau jinālaye
su duṣṭayaḥ su rupāḥ te jñāna dīpa tama upahāḥ
bhūpa arcita pada ambhojāḥ bhavanti bodhi bhāginaḥ
praṇītam sura saṃbhojyam valbha gandha samanvitam
ye ca asmin upaḍhaukitvā prabhajanti samādarāt
ṛddhimantaḥ nṛpa iṃdrāḥ te sapta ratna samanvitā
svargge deva adhipāḥ ca api bhavanti bodhi bhāginaḥ
ye ca asmin sura saṃpānam suvarṇṇa gandha saṃyutam
upaḍhaukya samārādhya prabhajante samāhitāḥ

original: te valiṣṭhā mahīpendrāḥ śrīsamṛddhā nirogiṇaḥ // SvayambhuP_2.134 //
analyzed: te valiṣṭhāḥ mahīpa indrāḥ śrī samṛddhāḥ nirogiṇaḥ
svarge gatāḥ ca deva indrāḥ bhavanti bodhi bhāginaḥ

original: ye cāsmiṃ skandamūlāni bījapatraphalāni ca // SvayambhuP_2.135 //
analyzed: ye ca asmin skanda mūlāni bīja patra phalāni ca
śraddhayā samupasthāpya saṃbhajante samāśritāḥ

original: te prabhuktvā yathākāmaṃ bhogyāni vividhānyapi // SvayambhuP_2.136 //
analyzed: te prabhuktvā yathākāmam bhogyāni vividhāni api
saddharmma sādhanāḥ raktāḥ saṃyānti ante jinālayam

analyzed: iti tena uditam śrutvāḥ mañjudevaḥ sa sanmatiḥ
saṃpaśyan steyatī dharma śrī mitram evam avravīt

original: yataḥ kiṃ dhanasaṃpatyā śraddhā te yadi vidyate // SvayambhuP_6.113 //
analyzed: yatas kim dhana saṃpatyā śraddhā te yadi vidyate
tuṣyante guruvaḥ bhakti mātreṇa atra dhanena tu
iti uktvā mañjudevena dharma śrī mitraḥ unmatāḥ
aṣṭāṃgeḥ tam gurum natvā prārthayat evam ādarāt

original: bhagavanyadi bhaktyaiva tuṣyate 'tra bhavān mama // SvayambhuP_6.115 //
analyzed: bhagavan yadi bhaktyā eva tuṣyate bhavān mama
bhavatām suśrūṣām eṣa karomi bhaktimān aham

original: iti me kṛpayā śāsta abhiṣeka yathāvidhiḥ // SvayambhuP_6.116 //
analyzed: iti me kṛpayā śāsta abhiṣeka yathāvidhiḥ
da tvā dvādaśa mantra artham viśuddhi dātum arhasi

original: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena mañjudevaṃ sa sarvavit // SvayambhuP_6.117 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthitam tena mañjudevam sa sarva vid
tam ālokya paṇyam evam abhāṣata

original: dāsyāmi te mahābhāga bhakti śraddhāsti te yadi // SvayambhuP_6.118 //
analyzed: dāsyāmi te mahābhāga bhakti śraddhā asti te yadi
abhiṣeka prasanna ātmā samādatsva samāhitaḥ

original: tataḥsa mañjudevaḥ śrī vajrācārya yathāvidhi // SvayambhuP_6.119 //
analyzed: tatas sa mañjudevaḥ śrī vajrācārya yathāvidhi
saṃsthāpya maṇḍalam dharmadhātu vāgīśvara abhidham
tat maṇḍalam samārādhya samabhyarcya yathāvidhim

original: abhiṣekaṃ prasannāya tasmai dadau sa vajradhṛk /
analyzed: abhiṣekam prasannāya tasmai dadau sa vajradhṛk

original: tatastān maṇḍale devān saṃdarśayaṃ yathākramāt // SvayambhuP_6.121 //
analyzed: tatas tān maṇḍale devān saṃdarśayam yathākramāt
pūjayitvā yathāśakti śaraṇe samayojayet
tatas tasmai prasannāya mañjudevaḥ yathāvidhi
dvādaśa akṣara guhya artha viśuddhi samupādiśat
tatas labdha abhiṣekaḥ sau dharma śrī mitraḥ
guhya artha viśuddhi jñānam āptavān

original: tasmai śāstre sabhāryāya svamātmānaṃ sa dakṣiṇāṃ // SvayambhuP_6.124 //
analyzed: tasmai śāstre sa bhāryāya svam ātmānam sa dakṣiṇām

original: saṃkalpya śraddhayā bhaktyā natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā /
analyzed: saṃkalpya śraddhayā bhaktyā natvā evam prārthayat mudā

original: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavat kṛpā prasādataḥ // SvayambhuP_6.125 //
analyzed: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavat kṛpā prasādataḥ
saṃprāpta pūrṇa saṃkalpaḥ bhavāmi śrī guṇa artha bhṛt
tat sadā aham bhavat pāda śaraṇe samupāśritaḥ
yathā atra bhava ādiṣṭam tathā eva saṃcare bhave
tat me nujñā ādi da tvā atra saṃbodhi jñāna sādhanam
sarva sattva hita arthena careyam bodhi saṃvaram

original: iti saṃprārthya dharmaśrī mitra sa samupāśritaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.128 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthya dharma śrī mitra sa samupāśritaḥ
śraddhā bhakti prasanna ātmā guru sevā paraḥ

original: tataḥ sa mañjudevastaṃ mahāsattvaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ // SvayambhuP_6.129 //
analyzed: tatas sa mañjudevaḥ tam mahāsattvam vicakṣaṇam
matvā saṃbodhi caryāyām niyoktum saṃvyanodayan

original: sādhu sādhu mahābhāgaḥ saṃcaratvaṃ jagaddhite // SvayambhuP_6.130 //
analyzed: sādhu sādhu mahābhāgaḥ saṃcaratvam jagat hite

original: saṃbodhi sādhanaṃ bodhicaryā vrata sadā bhava /
analyzed: saṃbodhi sādhanam bodhi caryā vrata sadā bhava
etad puṇya abhi lipta ātmā tri maṇḍalāḥ
bodhisattvāḥ mahā abhijñāḥ bhaveḥ śrī sat guṇa āśrayāḥ
tatas tvam bodhi saṃbhāram pūrayitvā yathākramam
niḥkleśaḥ bodhi prāptaḥ ham sambuddha padam āpnuyāḥ

original: iti me śāsanaṃ dhṛtvā smṛtvā dhyātvā samāhitaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.133 //
analyzed: iti me śāsanam dhṛtvā smṛtvā dhyātvā samāhitaḥ
triratnam samupāśritya saṃcarasva jagat hite

original: yadi jagaddhitaṃ kartuṃ saṃbodhiṃ prāpnumicchasi // SvayambhuP_6.134 //
analyzed: yadi jagat hitam kartum saṃbodhim prāpnum icchasi
saddharmam samupādiśya sarvān lokān pravodhaya

original: tatastān bodhitān sarvān kamena bodhisādhanaṃ // SvayambhuP_6.135 //
analyzed: tatas tān bodhitān sarvān kamena bodhi sādhanam
bodhi mārge pratiṣṭhāpya cārayasva jagat hite

original: tatasteṣāṃ samālokya cittaṃ saṃbodhi niścitaṃ // SvayambhuP_6.136 //
analyzed: tatas teṣām samālokya cittam saṃbodhi niścitam
triyānam samupādiśya parama arthe niyojaye
evam kṛtvā mahat dharmam āśu sambodhi sādhanam
bhadra śrī sat guṇa āpannām samāpnuyāḥ jagat śubhe
tena āśuḥ pariśuddha ātmā sambuddha padam āptavān
jagat dharmma mayam kṛtvā jina ālayam samāpnuyāḥ

original: iti bhadravrataṃ dhṛtvā gatvā tvaṃ svāśrame punaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.139 //
analyzed: iti bhadravratam dhṛtvā gatvā tvam sva āśrame punar
vyākhyāya nāma saṃgītim saddharmmam saṃpracāraye

original: ahamapi mahāsattva śrotuṃ tvad dharmmadeśanāṃ // SvayambhuP_6.140 //
analyzed: aham api mahāsattva śrotum tvat dharmma deśanām
sāṃghikān ca api tān druṣṭum āyāsyāmi tava āśrame

original: iti śāstā samādiṣṭaṃ niśaṃmya sa mahāmatiḥ // SvayambhuP_6.141 //
analyzed: iti śāstā samādiṣṭam niśaṃmya sa mahāmatiḥ
dharmaśrī mitraḥ ālokyaḥ tam gurum evam avravīt

original: maharddhiko bhagavāñchāsta vijñāsya te kathaṃ mayā // SvayambhuP_6.142 //
analyzed: maharddhikaḥ bhagavān śāsta vijñāsya te katham mayā
iti cihnam samādhāya tatra āgantum samarhati

original: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā mañjudevaḥ sa sanmati // SvayambhuP_6.143 //
analyzed: iti tena uditam śrutvā mañjudevaḥ sa sanmati
dharmaśrī mitramālokyaḥ punar evam abhāṣata

original: vatsāhamutpalaṃ dhṛtvā samāyāsyāmi te sabhāṃ // SvayambhuP_6.144 //
analyzed: vatsa aham utpalam dhṛtvā samāyāsyāmi te sabhām

original: tena cihnena māṃ yāta saṃjānīṣva samāgataṃ /
analyzed: tena cihnena mām yāta saṃjānīṣva samāgatam

original: iti satyaṃ samādhāya dhṛtvānuśāsanaṃ mama // SvayambhuP_6.145 //
analyzed: iti satyam samādhāya dhṛtvā anuśāsanam mama
saddharmma samupādeṣṭum teḥ tu maṃgalam

original: iti śāstā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa yatirutsukaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.146 //
analyzed: iti śāstā samādiṣṭam śrutvā sa yatiḥ utsukaḥ
śāstāram tam samālokya praṇatvā evam abhāṣataḥ
prasīdatu bhagavān śāstāḥ kṣantum arhati ca āgasam
bhavat prasādataḥ sarve sidhyate me samīhitam

original: tadanuśāsanaṃ dhṛtvā bhavatāṃ tatra jagaddhite // SvayambhuP_6.148 //
analyzed: tat anuśāsanam dhṛtvā bhavatām tatra jagat hite
vyākhyātum nāma saṃgīti saṃcare sāmpratam guroḥ

original: iti saṃprārthya dharmmaśrī mitra saḥ saṃprāsāditaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.149 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthya dharmma śrī mitra saḥ saṃprāsāditaḥ
śāstuḥ tasya pada ambhojam natvā tatas
mātroḥ ācārya yāḥ ca api mokṣa dāḥ vara da ākhyayoḥ
pāda amvujeṣu saṃnatvā saṃprasthitaḥ pramoditaḥ

original: tataḥ sa sanmati dharmmaśrīmitraḥ sahasāvrajan // SvayambhuP_6.151 //
analyzed: tatas sa sanmati dharmma śrī mitraḥ sahasā avrajan
āśu sva āśramam āsādya vihāram samupāviśat

original: tatra taṃ yatimāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ // SvayambhuP_6.152 //
analyzed: tatra tam yatim āyātam dṛṣṭvā sarve sāṃghikāḥ
praṇatvā kuśalam pṛṣṭavā praveśayan nija ālaye
tatas paredyus āmantraya sarvān saṃghān sa sanmatiḥ
vyākhyātum nāma saṃgīti sabhāsanam samāśrayat

original: taṃ sabhāsanamāsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi sāṃdhikāḥ // SvayambhuP_6.154 //
analyzed: tam sabhāsanam āsīnam dṛṣṭvā sarve sāṃdhikāḥ
divja bhūpa ādayaḥ ca api sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ

original: tatra sarve 'pi te lokāḥ praṇatvā taṃ yati kramāt // SvayambhuP_6.155 //
analyzed: tatra sarve pi te lokāḥ praṇatvā tam yati kramāt
parivṛtya puraskṛtya samantataḥ upāśrayat

original: tān sarvānsamupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā sa yatirātmavit // SvayambhuP_6.156 //
analyzed: tān sarvān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā sa yatiḥ ātma vid
vyākhyāya nāma saṃgītim sa samādiśat

original: tadā tatra manastasya jijñāsituṃ sa mañjuvāk // SvayambhuP_6.157 //
analyzed: tadā tatra manaḥ tasya jijñāsitum sa mañju vāc
dhṛtvā utpalam vinidya aṃgaḥ kucīvaram upācarat

original: tatra sa makṣikān kāye utpalena nivārayan // SvayambhuP_6.158 //
analyzed: tatra sa makṣikān kāye utpalena nivārayan
samāgatya sabhā ekānte paśyat lokān upāśrayet

original: samāśritaṃ sa dharmmaśrīmitro dṛṣṭvātmanā guruṃ // SvayambhuP_6.159 //
analyzed: samāśritam sa dharmma śrī mitraḥ dṛṣṭvā ātmanā gurum
utpalena parijñāya manasā evam vyacintayat

original: aho nūnamayaṃ śāstā mano jijñāsituṃ mama // SvayambhuP_6.160 //
analyzed: aho nūnam ayam śāstā manaḥ jijñāsitum mama
kucarā durbhaga ākāraḥ dhṛtvā utpalam iha āgataḥ

original: tatkathamahamutthāya pratyuṅgamya na meya hi // SvayambhuP_6.161 //
analyzed: tat katham aham utthāya hi
atha paśyat namaskāram na kuryāḥ gurave katham
yat yatra aham samutthāya na mā iyam enam ādarāt

original: dṛṣṭvā lokā ime māṃ dhikkuryuḥ sarve vicārataḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ ime mām dhik kuryuḥ sarve vicārataḥ

original: ete na jñāyate yaṃ hi mañjuśrī ṛddhimānapi // SvayambhuP_6.163 //
analyzed: ete na jñāyate yam hi mañjuśrī ṛddhimān api

original: īdṛgevāsya śāstā yaṃ miti me syād vihāsyatāṃ /
analyzed: īdṛś eva asya śāstā yam miti me syāt vihāsyatām

original: iti dhyātvā sa dharmmaśrīmitro lajjābhimohitaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.164 //
analyzed: iti dhyātvā sa dharmma śrī mitraḥ lajjā abhimohitaḥ
manasā evam namaskṛtvā śāstāram tamam ānayet

original: tataḥ sa vimukhī bhūya paśyannapya vibhāvitaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.165 //
analyzed: tatas sa vimukhī vibhāvitaḥ
pada mātram upādiśat

original: tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokāḥ śrutvā tatsaddharmmadeśanāṃ // SvayambhuP_6.166 //
analyzed: tatas sarve te lokāḥ śrutvā tad saddharmma deśanām
utthāya tam yatim natvā sva sva ālayam upācaran

original: tata loke gate dharmmaśrī mitraḥ sa samutthitaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.167 //
analyzed: tata loke gate dharmma śrī mitraḥ sa samutthitaḥ
śāstāram tam samālokya vanditum samupācarat

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mañjudevo 'sau vandituṃ samupāgataṃ // SvayambhuP_6.168 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā mañjudevaḥ vanditum samupāgatam
apaśyan vimukhī bhūya tatas saṃprasthitaḥ carat

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vimukhī bhūta dharmmaśrī mitra ātmanaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.169 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vimukhī bhūta dharmma śrī mitraḥ ātmanaḥ
aparādha mahat pāpam anusmṛtvā apatat bhuvi

original: nipatantaṃ tamālokya mañjuśrīḥ sa kṛpānidhiḥ // SvayambhuP_6.170 //
analyzed: nipatantam tam ālokya mañjuśrīḥ sa kṛpā nidhiḥ
sahasā pāṇinā dhṛtvā samutthāya tathā acarat

original: tatra sa utthito dharmmaśrī mitrastaṃ mahāmatiṃ // SvayambhuP_6.171 //
analyzed: tatra saḥ utthitaḥ dharmma śrī mitraḥ tam mahāmatim
pracarantam samālokya natvā āha evam mṛṣā punar

original: bhagavanna mayā dṛṣṭo bhavānatra samāgataḥ // SvayambhuP_6.172 //
analyzed: bhagavat na mayā dṛṣṭaḥ bhavān atra samāgataḥ
paścāt utpala cihnena jñāyate samāśritaḥ

original: ityuktvā sa mṛṣāvādaṃ sāñjalistasya saṅguroḥ // SvayambhuP_6.173 //
analyzed: iti uktvā sa mṛṣāvādam sa añjaliḥ tasya saṅguroḥ
mañjudevasya pāda abje praṇanāma rudan punar

original: tatra tasya mṛṣā vaktuṃ rubhe 'pi nayane mukhāt // SvayambhuP_6.174 //
analyzed: tatra tasya mṛṣā vaktum nayane mukhāt
śāstuḥ pāda abjayoḥ agre nipetantu mahī tale
tat patita sa dharmma śrī mitraḥ vihata mānasaḥ
cirādrudam samutthāyaḥ śāstāram evam avravīt
bhagavan yat mayā ajñānāt aparādham kṛtam gurau
bhavati tat bhavān śāstā kṣantum arhati durmateḥ

original: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena mañjuśrīḥ sa kṛpānidhiḥ // SvayambhuP_6.177 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthitam tena mañjuśrīḥ sa kṛpā nidhiḥ
vicakṣuṣkam tam ālokyaḥ kṛpā dṛśā evam avravīt

original: yadabhilajjayā karmma jñātvāpi duṣkṛtaṃ tvayā // SvayambhuP_6.178 //
analyzed: yat abhilajjayā karmma jñātvā api duṣkṛtam tvayā
tasya idam phalam āsādya bhoktā anyaṃm eva bhujyate

original: tathāpi jñāna dṛṣṭvā tvaṃ sampaśya ddṛṣṭimān yathā // SvayambhuP_6.179 //
analyzed: tathā api jñāna dṛṣṭvā tvam sampaśya ddṛṣṭimān yathā

original: jñānaṃ hi te 'sti yattena jñānaśrī mitra ucyase /
analyzed: jñānam hi te sti yat tena jñāna śrī mitraḥ ucyase

original: ityuktyaiva sa mañjuśrīḥ kṣaṇādantarhita stataḥ // SvayambhuP_6.180 //
analyzed: iti uktyā eva sa mañjuśrīḥ kṣaṇāt antarhitaḥ statas
ākāśāt pakṣi vat gatvā sva āśrame samupāyayau
atrā etat sarva vṛttāntam bhāryayoḥ puratoḥ mudā
samākhyāya sa mañjuśrīḥ stasthau loka hita artha bhṛt
tatas prabhṛti sa jñāna śrī mitraḥ jñānacakṣuṣā
paśyan saddharmmam ākhyāya prācarat ca jagat hite

original: tadā maitreya tenāsya dharmadhātoḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ // SvayambhuP_6.183 //
analyzed: tadā maitreya tena asya dharmadhātoḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
dharmadhātum vāgīśvara abhidham

original: iti matvātra ye dharmadhātu vāgīśvara narāḥ // SvayambhuP_6.184 //
analyzed: iti matvā atra ye narāḥ
śraddhayā vidhinā abhyarcya bhajanti śaraṇa āśritāḥ

original: abhiṣekaṃ ca saṃprāpya bodhicittā samāhitāḥ // SvayambhuP_6.185 //
analyzed: abhiṣekam ca saṃprāpya bodhi cittā samāhitāḥ
saddharmma dhāraṇī vidyā mantrāṇi dhārayanti ye

original: te sarve vimalātmānaḥ pariśuddha trimaṇḍalāḥ // SvayambhuP_6.186 //
analyzed: te sarve vimala ātmānaḥ pariśuddha tri maṇḍalāḥ
bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ catur brahma vihāriṇaḥ

original: bhadraśrī sadguṇādhārāḥ sarva vidyā vicakṣaṇāḥ // SvayambhuP_6.187 //

analyzed: ṛddhi siddhi mahā abhijñāḥ bhaveyuḥ bhadra cāriṇaḥ

original: āśuḥ sambodhi saṃbhāraṃ pūrayitvā yathākramaṃ // SvayambhuP_6.188 //
analyzed: āśuḥ sambodhi saṃbhāram pūrayitvā yathākramam

original: arhantastrividhāṃ bodhiṃ prāpya yāyu jiṃnālayaṃ // SvayambhuP_6.189 //
analyzed: arhantaḥ trividhām bodhim prāpya jiṃnālayam

original: iti matvābhivāchanti prāptuṃ ye saugataṃ padaṃ /
analyzed: iti matvā abhivāchanti prāptum ye saugatam padam

original: te 'tra bauddhālaye dharmmadhātu vāgīśvare sadā // SvayambhuP_6.190 //
analyzed: te tra bauddha ālaye dharmmadhātu vāc īśvare sadā
śraddhayā bhajanam kṛtvā prāpya abhiṣekam ādarāt
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya saṃbodhi nihita āśrayāḥ

original: bodhicaryā vrataṃ dhṛtvā saṃcarate jagaddhite // SvayambhuP_6.192 //
analyzed: bodhi caryā vratam dhṛtvā saṃcarate jagat hite
āśu te vimala ātmānaḥ pariśuddha tri maṇḍalāḥ
bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ catur brahma vihāriṇaḥ
ṛddhi siddhi mahā abhijñāḥ bhaveyu bhardra cāriṇaḥ
tatas saṃbodhi saṃbhāram pūrayitvā drutam kramāt

original: arhantamtrividhāṃ bodhiṃ prāpya yāsyatha nivṛtiṃ // SvayambhuP_6.195 //
analyzed: arhantam trividhām bodhim prāpya yāsyatha nivṛtim
iti ādiṣṭam muni indreṇa niśamya te sabhā āśritāḥ

original: sarve tatheti vijñāya prābhyanandan pravodhitāḥ // SvayambhuP_6.196 //
analyzed: sarve tathā iti vijñāya prābhyanandan pravodhitāḥ

original: itiśrī svayaṃbhū dharmmadhātu vāgīśvarābhidhāna prasiddha pravartano nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ /
analyzed: iti śrī svayaṃbhū dharmmadhātu vāgīśvara abhidhāna prasiddha pravartanaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
saptamaḥ adhyāyaḥ svayambhū dharmadhātu vāgīśvaragutikṛtapravartanaḥ nāma

original: atha bhūyaḥ sa maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: atha bhūyas sa maitreyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāmatiḥ
sa añjaliḥ evam avravīt
bhagavat śilayā āchādya dharmmadhātum imam kadā

original: kenaiva hetunā stūpaṃ ko vyadhādīṣṭikāmayaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.2 //
analyzed: kena eva hetunā stūpam kaḥ vyadhāt iṣṭikā mayam
bhagavan tat samālokya sarvvān lokān sa kautukān
etat hetu samādiśya vinodayitum arhati
iti saṃprārthitam tena maitreyena muni īśvaraḥ
bhagavān sa mahāsattvam sampaśyan evam ādiśat
śṛṇu maitreya yena ayam prakāśane
etat hetum samākhyāsi sarve loka abhibodhane
tat yathā nivṛtim yāte saṃbuddhe kanakamunau

yathāvidhi samabhyarcya śraddhā bhakti prasanna dhīḥ
na eka pradakṣiṇīkṛtya stutvā gītaiḥ manoharaiḥ

original: aṣṭāṃgai praṇatiṃ kṛtvā dhyātvā japtvā bhajan mudā /
analyzed: aṣṭāṃgaiḥ praṇatim kṛtvā dhyātvā japtvā bhajan mudā

original: tataścedaṃ sa saṃvīkṣya mañjudevasya nirmmitaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.101 //
analyzed: tatas ca idam sa saṃvīkṣya mañjudevasya nirmmitam
caityam abhyarcya saṃstutvā gītaiḥ natvā bhajan mudā

original: tato 'sau ca mahādevī yonirūpāṃ khagānanāṃ // SvayambhuP_7.102 //
analyzed: tatas sau ca mahādevī yoni rūpām khaga ānanām
samālokya prasanna ātmā yathāvidhi samarccayet

original: tatrāpi sa mahāsattva stutvā gītairmanoharaiḥ // SvayambhuP_7.103 //
analyzed: tatra api sa mahā sattva stutvā gītaiḥ manoharaiḥ
aṣṭāṅgaiḥ praṇatim kṛtvā pradakṣiṇā ati anekaśas

original: śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatvā smṛtvā dhyātvā samāhitaḥ // SvayambhuP_7.104 //
analyzed: śraddhayā śaraṇam gatvā smṛtvā dhyātvā samāhitaḥ
tat vidyā dhāraṇī mantram japitvā prābhyanandata
tatas sau ca mahā sattvaḥ vāgmatī pramukhāni api
tīrthāni etāni sarvāṇi sa samīkṣya prābhyanandata

original: tata sa teṣu tīrtheṣu sarveṣvapi yathākramaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.106 //
analyzed: tata sa teṣu tīrtheṣu sarveṣu api yathākramam
snātvā dāna vrata ādīni kṛtvā bhajan pramoditaḥ

original: tato 'ṣṭau vītarāgāṃśca dṛṣṭvā sa saṃpraharṣitaḥ // SvayambhuP_7.107 //
analyzed: ṣṭau vīta rāgān ca dṛṣṭvā sa saṃpraharṣitaḥ

original: yathāvidhi samabhyarcya stutvā natvā bhajan kramāt /
analyzed: yathāvidhi samabhyarcya stutvā natvā bhajan kramāt

original: tataḥ pracaṇḍadevaḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ prasāditaḥ // SvayambhuP_7.108 //
analyzed: tatas pracaṇḍadevaḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ prasāditaḥ
atra eva sarvat āśritya vratam caritum aicchata

original: tataḥ sa vimalālokya himālaye samantataḥ // SvayambhuP_7.109 //
analyzed: tatas sa vimala ālokya himālaye samantataḥ
saddharma parama ānandam bhuktvā utsahe su nivṛttau

original: tataḥ sa mañjudevasya śiṣyaṃ śāsana sambhṛtaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.110 //
analyzed: tatas sa mañjudevasya śiṣyam śāsana sambhṛtam
sat gurum samupāśritya prārthayat eva mānataḥ
bhadanta atra puṇya kṣetre mahā pīṭhe himālaye
prabrajyā sambaram dhṛtvā saṃsthātum utsahe sadā

original: tad bhavān kṛpayā mahayaṃ saṃbodhijñānasādhanaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.112 //
analyzed: tat bhavān kṛpayā mahayam saṃbodhi jñāna sādhanam
prabrajyā samvaram dātum samarhati jagat hite

original: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena niśamya sa guṇākaraḥ // SvayambhuP_7.113 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthitam tena niśamya sa guṇākaraḥ
bodhisattvam su vijñam tam sampaśyan evam abravīt

original: ehi bhadra samīcchā te yadyasti bauddhasambare // SvayambhuP_7.114 //
analyzed: ehi bhadra samīcchā te yadi asti bauddha sambare
pravajyā vratam ādhāya saṃcarasva samāhitaḥ

original: ityuktvā sa mahābhijñaḥ pravrajitaṃ vidhāya taṃ // SvayambhuP_7.115 //
analyzed: iti uktvā sa mahā abhijñaḥ pravrajitam vidhāya tam
bodhi caryā vratam da tvā pracārayet jagat hite

original: tatra sa muṇḍitapātrī surakta cīvarāvṛtaḥ // SvayambhuP_7.116 //
analyzed: tatra sa muṇḍita pātrī cīvara āvṛtaḥ
brahmacārī yatiḥ bhikṣuniḥ sudhīḥ abhūt
śāntaśrībhikṣuḥ iti nāmaḥ bhūt

original: tataḥ sa sarvavicchāstā bodhisattvā hitārthadik // SvayambhuP_7.117 //
analyzed: tatas sa sarva vid śāstā bodhisattvāḥ hita artha diś
sa deva asura lokānām api vandya arcitaḥ bhavat
tat ārabhya sa śānta śrī dharmadhātaḥ jinālaye
triratna bhajanam kṛtvā tasthau bodhi vratam caran

original: sa ekasmin dine cemaṃ jyotīrūpaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ // SvayambhuP_7.119 //
analyzed: saḥ ekasmin dine ca imam jyotiḥ rūpam prabhāsvaram
ratna padmāsana āsīnam paśyan evam vyacintayet

original: aho hyayaṃ svayaṃ jāto jyotirūpo prabhāsvaraḥ // SvayambhuP_7.120 //
analyzed: aho hi ayam svayam jātaḥ prabhāsvaraḥ
ratna padmāsana āsīnaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate jagat hite
kiyatkālam ayam śrīmān dharmmadhātuḥ jina ālayaḥ
evam saṃbhāṣayan lokān saṃsthāsyate jagat hite

original: yataḥ kalau samayā te loka pañcakaṣāyite // SvayambhuP_7.122 //
analyzed: yatas kalau samayā te loka pañca kaṣāyite
sarve lokāḥ durācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti durāśayāḥ
mada abhimāninaḥ duṣṭāḥ lobhinaḥ kāma cāriṇaḥ
īrṣyālavaḥ pramattāḥ ca mātsarya vyākula āśayāḥ
kleśa ahaṃkāra garva andhāḥ nirvivekāḥ pramādinaḥ
kāma bhoga ati saṃraktāḥ daśā kuśala cāriṇaḥ

original: tadā kathamayaṃ śrīmān jyotīrūpaḥ prabhāsvaraḥ // SvayambhuP_7.125 //
analyzed: tadā katham ayam śrīmān jyotīrūpaḥ prabhāsvaraḥ
ratna padmāsana āsīnaḥ evam tiṣṭhet jagat hite

original: nūnaṃ ye lobhino duṣṭāḥ kleśavyākulamānasāḥ // SvayambhuP_7.126 //
analyzed: nūnam ye lobhinaḥ duṣṭāḥ kleśa vyākula mānasāḥ

original: imaṃ caityaṃ pratikṣipya ratnāni saṃharet tadā /
analyzed: imam caityam pratikṣipya ratnāni saṃharet tadā

original: duṣṭā ca tathānye 'pi duṣṭāḥ kleśābhimāninaḥ // SvayambhuP_7.127 //
analyzed: ca tathā anye duṣṭāḥ kleśa abhimāninaḥ
jyotiḥ rūpam imam caityam dhvaṃsayiṣyanti sarvathā

original: evaṃ tadā kalau kāle dhvaṃsite 'smin jinālaye // SvayambhuP_7.128 //
analyzed: evam tadā kalau kāle dhvaṃsite smin jinālaye
mahāpātaka saṃbhūtam mahā utpātam bhavet dhruvam
iti hetoḥ aham dharmadhātoḥ asya su rakṣaṇe
śilā āchādya caityam kuryāḥ mahā uchrayam

original: tadā sarve 'pi lokāste imaṃ stūpaṃ mahochritaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.130 //
analyzed: tadā sarve lokāḥ te imam stūpam mahā uchritam
samīkṣya śraddhayā bhaktyā bhajiṣyanti prasāditāḥ
tadā etat puṇya bhāvena sarvadā atra samantataḥ
subhikṣam maṅgala utsāham nirutpātam bhavet dhruvam

original: iti dhyātvā sa śāntaśrīḥ śāstāraṃ taṃ punarmudā // SvayambhuP_7.132 //
analyzed: iti dhyātvā sa śānta śrīḥ śāstāram tam punar mudā
upetya sa añjaliḥ natvā prārthayat evam ādarāt
bhadanta sat guru śāstar yat icchām iha sāmpratam
dharmma ādhātum imam caityam gupti karttum su rakṣaṇe
śilayā āchādya sva iṣṭikābhiḥ samuchritam
stūpam kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya sthirīkarttum samutsahe

original: ityatra me bhavāñchāstā gupti kṛtvābhirakṣaṇe // SvayambhuP_7.135 //
analyzed: iti atra me bhavān śāstā gupti kṛtvā abhirakṣaṇe
dharmmadhātoḥ jagadbharttuḥ anujñām dātum arhati

original: iti saṃprārthite tena śāntaśriyā niśamya saḥ // SvayambhuP_7.136 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthite tena śānta śriyā niśamya saḥ
mahāmatiḥ mahā sattvam tam paśyan evam abravīt
bhadrasvaṃyambhūvān tasya gupti karttum yadi icchasi

original: pratyekaṃ śrāvakaṃ yānaṃ muktvā mahati saṃśritaḥ /
analyzed: pratyekam śrāvakam yānam muktvā mahati saṃśritaḥ
vajra abhiṣekam ādāya cara vajravratam punar
tatas mārān vinirjjitya samārādhya jineśvaram

original: saṃprārthya śilayācchādya kuru stūpaṃ samuchritaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.139 //
analyzed: saṃprārthya śilayā ācchādya kuru stūpam samuchritam

original: iti śāstā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sa pramoditaḥ /
analyzed: iti śāstā samādiṣṭam niśamya sa pramoditaḥ

original: śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvā ca prārthayadevamādarāt // SvayambhuP_7.140 //
analyzed: śāstāram tam praṇatvā ca prārthayat evam ādarāt
sat guruḥ me bhavān śāstā dharmmadhātu surakṣaṇe

original: vajracaryāvrataṃ datvā cāraya māṃ jagaddhite // SvayambhuP_7.141 //
analyzed: vajra caryā vratam da tvā cāraya mām jagat hite

original: iti saṃprārthite tena śāntaśriyā niśamya saḥ /
analyzed: iti saṃprārthite tena śānta śriyā niśamya saḥ
mahāmatiḥ mahā sattvam tam samīkṣya evam abravīt

original: yadi śraddhāsti te bhadra vajracaryā mahāvrataṃ /
analyzed: yadi śraddhā asti te bhadra vajra caryā mahā vratam

original: yathāvidhi pradāsyāmi tad gṛhāṇa jagaddhite // SvayambhuP_7.143 //
analyzed: yathāvidhi pradāsyāmi tat gṛhāṇa jagat hite
iti uktvā sa mahā ācāryaḥ tasmai śānta śriye kramāt
sa abhiṣekam mahāyāne vajra caryā vratam dadau
śānta śrī vajrācāryaḥ iti sthāpitaḥ tad kṣaṇe ca adhijña prāptaḥ bhūt

original: tataḥ prāptābhiṣekaḥ sa śāntaśrī vajrayogavit // SvayambhuP_7.145 //
analyzed: tatas prāpta abhiṣekaḥ sa śānta śrī vajra yoga vid

original: sa svātmā dakṣiṇāṃ tasmai gurave pradadau mudā /
analyzed: sa sva ātmā dakṣiṇām tasmai gurave pradadau mudā

original: tataḥ sa vajradhṛg yogī mahābhijñaḥ susiddhimān // SvayambhuP_7.146 //
analyzed: tatas sa vajradhṛk yogī mahā abhijñaḥ su siddhimān
sva kula īśam samārādhya sa gaṇam prābhajat mudā

original: tataḥ sa vajradhṛg yogī mahābhijñaḥ susiddhimān // SvayambhuP_7.147 //
analyzed: tatas sa vajradhṛk yogī mahā abhijñaḥ su siddhimān
saddharmma sādhana utsāhī sarva vidyā adhipaḥ api abhūt

original: tataḥ sāsturanujñāṃ sa samāsādya prasāditaḥ // SvayambhuP_7.148 //
analyzed: tatas sa astuḥ anujñām sa samāsādya prasāditaḥ
dharmadhātum samārādhya prārthayat eva mānataḥ

original: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ rakṣaṇāya yat // SvayambhuP_7.149 //
analyzed: bhagavat nātha sarvajña bhavatām rakṣaṇāya yat
jyotīrūpam samācchādya caityam karttum iha utsahe

original: tad bhavān trijagannātha kṛpayā me prasīdatu // SvayambhuP_7.150 //
analyzed: tat bhavān trijagannātha kṛpayā me prasīdatu
me tat sarva kṣantum arhati

original: iti saṃprārthya sa prājña jyotīrūpaṃ jinālayaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.151 //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthya sa prājña jyotīrūpam jina ālayam
sa ratna padma āchādya śilayā samagopayat
tad upari iṣṭikābhiḥ ca vidhāya caityam ucchritam
yathāvidhi pratiṣṭhāpya mahā utsāhaiḥ sadā abhajat

original: tata idañca pucchāgraṃ mañjudevasya nirmmitaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.153 //
analyzed: tatas idam ca puccha agram mañjudevasya nirmmitam
caityam sa śilayā āchādya stūpam vyadhāt tathā uttamam

original: idaṃ stūpaṃ ca sa śāntaśrīḥ pratiṣṭhāpya yathāvidhi // SvayambhuP_7.154 //
analyzed: idam stūpam ca sa śānta śrīḥ pratiṣṭhāpya yathāvidhi
sarvadā śraddhayā bhaktyā mahā utsāhaiḥ mudā abhajat
tatas ca asau mahācāryam ārādhya pañca devatāḥ
pañca sutāḥ pureṣu evam pratiṣṭhāpya sadā abhajat

original: tad yathā devatā pañca prathamaṃ vāyudevatā // SvayambhuP_7.156 //
analyzed: tat yathā devatā pañca prathamam vāyu devatā
vāyupure pratiṣṭhāpya vahni puraḥ agni devatā

original: nāgapure ca nāgendro vasupure vasundharāṃ // SvayambhuP_7.157 //
analyzed: nāgapure ca nāga indraḥ vasupure vasundharām
śāntipure mahā śrīmat sambaram su gaṇam tathā

original: etān sarvān samārādhya sa ācārya yathāvidhi // SvayambhuP_7.158 //
analyzed: etān sarvān samārādhya saḥ ācārya yathāvidhi
mahā utsāhaiḥ samabhyarcya prābhajan sarvadā mudā

original: evaṃ kṛtvā sa ācārya śāntaśrīḥ kṛtakṛtyau maharddhikaḥ // SvayambhuP_7.159 //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā saḥ ācārya śānta śrīḥ kṛtakṛtyau maharddhikaḥ
bhadra śrī mantra saṃsiddhaḥ sarva vidyā adhipaḥ bhavat

original: tato bhūyaḥ sa ācāryo bodhisattvā mahāmatiḥ // SvayambhuP_7.160 //
analyzed: tatas bhūyas saḥ ācāryaḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāmatiḥ
sarva sattva hita utsāhī dhyātvā evam samacintayat
atrā evam aham ārādhya sarvān devān yathāvidhi
pratiṣṭhāpya samabhyarcya mahā utsāhaiḥ bhaje mudā
tathā atra sarvadā dharmmadhātu vāc īśvaram sadā
smṛtvā dhyātvā samārādhya saṃtiṣṭheyam jagat hite
iti dhyātvā sa śānta śrīḥ ācāryaḥ triguṇa artha bhṛt
sarva sattva hita arthena nanditaḥ

original: evaṃ tā devatā bhaktyā bhajanti ye yathāvidhi // SvayambhuP_7.164 //
analyzed: evam tāḥ devatāḥ bhaktyā bhajanti ye yathāvidhi
te bhadra śrī guṇa āpannāḥ bhaveyuḥ bodhi cāriṇaḥ

original: tad viśeṣaphalaṃ cāpi śṛṇu maitreya sāṃprataṃ // SvayambhuP_7.165 //
analyzed: tat viśeṣa phalam ca api śṛṇu maitreya sāṃpratam
vakṣyāmi atra samāsatas

original: tadyathā ye samārādhya sagaṇāṃ vāyudevatāṃ // SvayambhuP_7.166 //
analyzed: tat yathā ye samārādhya sa gaṇām vāyudevatām
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya saṃbhajante samādarāt

original: teṣāṃ vātamahotpātabhayaṃ kvāpi na vidyate // SvayambhuP_7.167 //
analyzed: teṣām vāta mahā utpāta bhayam kvāpi na vidyate
nīrogyam śrī samāpannam kāma bhojyam sadā bhave

original: ye cāpyevaṃ samārādhya sagaṇāṃ vahnidevatāṃ // SvayambhuP_7.168 //
analyzed: ye ca api evam samārādhya sa gaṇām vahni devatām
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya sambhajante samādarāt

original: teṣāṃ vahnimahotpātaṃ bhayaṃ kvāpi na vidyate // SvayambhuP_7.169 //
analyzed: teṣām vahni mahā utpātam bhayam kvāpi na vidyate
paripuṣṭa indriya ārogya mahā saukhyam sadā bhave

original: ye cāpyevaṃ samārādhya sagaṇāṃ nāgadevatāṃ // SvayambhuP_7.170 //
analyzed: ye ca api evam samārādhya sa gaṇām nāga devatām
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya prabhajante sadā mudā

original: teṣāṃ na vidyate kvāpi durbhikṣotpātajaṃ bhayaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.171 //
analyzed: teṣām na vidyate kvāpi durbhikṣa utpāta jam bhayam
bhadra śrī ratna saṃpatti kāma bhojyam sadā bhave

original: ye cāpyevaṃ samārādhya sagaṇāṃ śrībasundharāṃ // SvayambhuP_7.172 //
analyzed: ye ca api evam samārādhya sa gaṇām śrī basundharām
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya saṃbhajante samādarāt

original: teṣāṃ dāridrayaduḥkhādi bhayaṃ nāsti kadācana // SvayambhuP_7.173 //
analyzed: teṣām dāridraya duḥkha ādi bhayam na asti kadācana
bhadra śrī sat guṇa āpanna mahā saṃpad sukham sadā

original: ye cāpyevaṃ samārādhya sagaṇaṃ sambaraṃ jinaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.174 //
analyzed: ye ca api evam samārādhya sa gaṇam sambaram jinam
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya saṃbhajante sat ādarāt

original: teṣāṃ mārāpasargga ca bhayaṃ kvāpi na vidyate // SvayambhuP_7.175 //
analyzed: teṣām ca bhayam kvāpi na vidyate
saddharmma ratna saṃpatti mahā aiśvarya sukham sadā

original: ye cedaṃ caityamārādhya mañjudevasya nirmmitaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.176 //
analyzed: ye ca idam caityam ārādhya mañjudevasya nirmmitam
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya saṃbhajante samādarāt

original: taddurbhbhagā durācārā duṣṭā syurna kadācana // SvayambhuP_7.177 //
analyzed: tad durbhbhagāḥ durācārāḥ duṣṭāḥ syuḥ na kadācana
sarve dharma adhipāḥ nāthāḥ bhaveyuḥ śrī guṇa ākarāḥ

original: ye cāpīdaṃ samārādhya dharmmadhātuṃ jinālayaṃ // SvayambhuP_7.178 //
analyzed: ye ca api idam samārādhya dharmmadhātum jina ālayam
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya sambhajante samādarāt
te sarvve bhadra śrī sat guṇa āśrayāḥ
bodhisattvāḥ mahā abhijñāḥ bhaveyuḥ bodhi cāriṇaḥ

original: ya etā devatāḥ sarvāḥ smṛtvā dhyātvāpi sarvadā // SvayambhuP_7.180 //
analyzed: yaḥ etāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ smṛtvā dhyātvā api sarvadā
nāma api ca samuccārya saṃbhajante

original: te 'pi sarve na yāsyanti durggatiṃ ca kadācana // SvayambhuP_7.181 //
analyzed: te sarve na yāsyanti durggatim ca kadācana
sadā sat gati saṃjātāḥ bhaveyuḥ śrī guṇa āśrayāḥ
tatas te sukṛta āraktāḥ sadharmma guṇa lālasāḥ
triratna śaraṇam kṛtvā saṃcareran sadā śubhe
tatas te vimala ātmānaḥ pariśuddha indriya āśayāḥ
bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ catur brahma vihāriṇaḥ
sarva sattva hita ādhānam careyuḥ bodhisambaram
tatas te bodhi saṃbhāram purayitvā yathākramam
daśa bhūmi īśvarāḥ nāthāḥ bhaveyuḥ sugata ātmajāḥ
tatas te nirmmala ātmānaḥ saṃsāra gati niḥspṛhāḥ

original: arhantaḥ savala māraṃ nirjitya syurniraṃjanāḥ // SvayambhuP_7.186 //
analyzed: arhantaḥ sa vala māram nirjitya syuḥ niraṃjanāḥ
trividhām bodhim āsādya saddharmma guṇa bhāskarāḥ
sarva sattva hita arthena saṃbuddha padam āpnuyu
ye pi etad guṇa māhātmyam śrutvā api atyanumoditāḥ
tathā tat puṇya māhātmyam praśasanti samādarāt
te pi sarve vikalmāṣāḥ pariśuddhi tri maṇḍalāḥ
śrīmantaḥ sat guṇa ādhārāḥ bhaveyuḥ bodhi mānasāḥ
na yāḥ yāyuḥ dugatim kvāpi sadā sat gati sambhavāḥ
sarva sattva hitam kṛtvā saṃcareran jagat hite

original: evaṃ matvā nṛpaḥ svāmī svayaṃ nītyā vicārayan /

original: bodhayitvā prayatnena lokān saṃpālayat sadā // SvayambhuP_8.89 //

original: natvā rājā svayaṃ nītyā vicārayan samācaret // SvayambhuP_8.95 //
analyzed: natvā rājā svayam nītyā vicārayan samācaret

original: tat me yaducitaṃ dharmma tat samādeṣṭumarhati // SvayambhuP_8.98 //

original: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvācāryaḥ sa satmatiḥ /

analyzed: yadi asti te kṛpā loka tat kuru yat mayā uditam

original: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā carasva poṣadhaṃ vrataṃ // SvayambhuP_8.102 //
analyzed: triratna bhajanam kṛtvā carasva poṣadham vratam

original: tathā sarvā imā pañca devatāśca yathāvidhi /
analyzed: tathā sarvāḥ imāḥ pañca devatāḥ ca yathāvidhi
samārādhya samabhyarcya saṃbhajasva sat ādarāt
imam mañjuśrīyan ca api caityam ārādhya sarvadā
yathāvidhi samabhyarcya saṃbhajasva mahā utsavaiḥ
tathā aṣṭau vīta rāgān ca samārādhya yathāvidhi
samabhyarcya mahā utsāhaiḥ saṃbhajasva sadā ādarāt
tathā māheśvarīm devī khagānanām samādarām
samārādhya samabhyarcya saṃbhajasva yathāvidhim
ete sarve devāḥ hi sarva loka adhipa īśvarāḥ
sarva sattva hita arthena prādurbhūtāḥ svayam khalu
tat atra eteṣu deveṣu sarveṣu śraddhayā sadā

original: vidhinā bhajanaṃ kṛtvā saṃcarasva jagaddhite // SvayambhuP_8.109 //
analyzed: vidhinā bhajanam kṛtvā saṃcarasva jagat hite
lokān ca api tathā sarvān bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ

kārayitvā mahā utsāhaiḥ bodhimārge pracāraya

original: tadā sarvamahotpātaṃ sarvatra vilayaṃ vrajet // SvayambhuP_8.113 //

original: viramya pāpamārgebhyaḥ saṃcareran sadā śubhe // SvayambhuP_8.116 //

original: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhajasva poṣadhaṃ vrataṃ // SvayambhuP_8.119 //
analyzed: triratnam śaraṇam gatvā bhajasva poṣadham vratam
tatas sarvān imān devān dharmmadhātu mukhān sadā
yathāvidhi samārādhya saṃbhajasva samarcayan
lokān api tathā sarvān bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ
sarveṣu eteṣu tīrtheṣu snāpayitvā yathāvidhim
triratna śaraṇe sthāpya saṃbodhi jñāna sādhanam
bhad śrī sat guṇa ādhāram cāraya poṣadham vratam

original: iti śāntaśriyā śāstā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /

original: ityādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā te mantriṇo janāḥ /

original: dṛṣṭvā sarveṣu tīrtheṣu snātvā dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.80 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sarveṣu tīrtheṣu snātvā dānam yathā īpsitam
tathā aṣṭau vīta rāgāḥ ca samālokya pramāditaḥ
yathāvidhi samārādhya samabhyarcī abhijam kramāt
tatas samīkṣya tam śrīmat dharmmadhātum svayaṃbhuvam
yathāvidhi samārādhya samabhyarcya abhajat mudā
tatas vāyupure vāyu devatā abhyarccitā mayā
tatas ca agnipure vahniḥ devatā api mayā arccitā
tathā nāgapure nāga rājān ca api mayā arccitā

original: tathā tathā vasupure devī vasundharāṃ samarccitā // SvayambhuP_10.84 //
analyzed: tathā tathā vasupure devī vasundharām samarccitā
tatas śāntipure śrīmat sambaraḥ ca samarccitaḥ
tatas śāntikara ācāryaḥ samālokya mayā arcitaḥ
devīm khagānanām ca api samārādhya samarcitā

original: mañjudevasya caityaṃ ca yathāvidhi samarcitaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.86 //
analyzed: mañjudevasya caityam ca yathāvidhi samarcitam
evam bhadanta tatra upacchandohe puṇya bhū tale
yathāvidhi samārādhya sarva devāḥ mayā arcitāḥ
etat puṇyam mayā labdham bhavat kṛpā anubhāvataḥ

original: tadatra janmasāphalyaṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi me 'dhunā // SvayambhuP_10.88 //
analyzed: tat atra janma sāphalyam jīvitam ca api me dhunā
tathā atra sarvadā śāsta dharmadhātum jina ālayam

original: smṛtvā nāma samuccārya dhyātvā bhajeya mā bhavaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.89 //
analyzed: smṛtvā nāma samuccārya dhyātvā bhajeya mā bhavam

original: iti rājñā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā so 'rha prasāditaḥ /
analyzed: iti rājñā samākhyātam śrutvā saḥ ṛha prasāditaḥ

original: nṛpati taṃ samālokya punarevaṃ samādiśat // SvayambhuP_10.90 //
analyzed: nṛpati tam samālokya punar evam samādiśat
dhanyaḥ si yat mahā rāja dharmadhātum jina ālayam

original: smṛtvā dhyātvāpi saṃbhaktuṃmicchase 'tra sadā bhaja // SvayambhuP_10.91 //
analyzed: smṛtvā dhyātvā api saṃbhaktum icchase sadā bhaja
bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva dharma adhipaḥ bhaveḥ
tatas saṃbodhi saṃbhāram pūrayitvā yathākramam
arhan tri bodhim āsādya dhruvam buddha padam labheḥ
samutpatti kathām tasya dharmadhātoḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
śrutvā api yat mahat puṇyam saṃbodhi sādhanam labhet
iti matvā samutpatti kathām tasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ

original: satkṛtya śraddhayā martyāḥ śrotumarhanti sarvathā // SvayambhuP_10.95 //
analyzed: satkṛtya śraddhayā martyāḥ śrotum arhanti sarvathā
samutpatti kathām tasya dharmadhātoḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ

original: śṛṇvanti ye narā bhaktyā satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā // SvayambhuP_10.96 //
analyzed: śṛṇvanti ye narāḥ bhaktyā satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā

original: durgatiṃ te na gacchanti kutrāpi hi kadācan /
analyzed: durgatim te na gacchanti kutra api hi kadācana
sadā sat gati saṃjātāḥ bhadra śrī sat guṇa āśrayāḥ
sarva sattva hita ādhāna bodhi caryā vrata āratāḥ
mahā abhijñāḥ jagat nāthāḥ bhaveyuḥ sugata ātmajāḥ
krameṇa bodhi sambhāram pūrayitvā jagat hite

original: arhantatrividhāṃ bodhiṃ prāpyeyuḥ saugataṃ padaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.99 //
analyzed: arhanta trividhām bodhim prāpyeyuḥ saugatam padam
iti matvā mahā rāja śrotavyam śraddhayā ādarāt
svayambhū guṇa māhātmyam durllabham bodhi vāñchibhiḥ

original: śṛṇvanti ye narā bhaktyā satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā /
analyzed: śṛṇvanti ye narāḥ bhaktyā satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā
te pi na durgatim yāyuḥ sadā asat gati saṃgatāḥ
bhadra śrī sat guṇa ādhārāḥ bhaveyuḥ bodhi lābhinaḥ
tasmāt etat mahat puṇyam śrutvā dhyātvā sat ādarāt

original: smṛtvā nāma samuccārya saṃbhaktavyaṃ svayaṃbhuvaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.103 //
analyzed: smṛtvā nāma samuccārya saṃbhaktavyam svayaṃbhuvam
aham api purā rājan dharmmadhātoḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
śrutvā sat guṇa sāṃkathyam babhūva saṃpramoditaḥ
tatas ham sahasā tatra nepāle samupācaran

original: snātvā sarveṣu tīrtheṣu dadau dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.105 //
analyzed: snātvā sarveṣu tīrtheṣu dadau dānam yathā īpsitam
aṣṭau tān vīta rāgān ca samārādhya mayā arcitāḥ

original: devīṃ khagānanāṃ cāpi samārādhya samarcitā // SvayambhuP_10.106 //
analyzed: devīm khagānanām ca api samārādhya samarcitā
mañjudevasya caityam ca samārādhya samarcitam

original: pañca purā sthitā pañca devatāśca samarcitāḥ // SvayambhuP_10.107 //
analyzed: pañca purā sthitā pañca devatāḥ ca samarcitāḥ
tathā śāntikara ācāryaḥ samālokya samarcitaḥ
tatas śaraṇam āśritya svayaṃbhuvaḥ

original: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ samārādhya mudā bhajaṃ /
analyzed: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityam samārādhya mudā bhajam
evam tatra sat āśritya dharmadhātoḥ rūpāsakaḥ
triratna bhajanam kṛtvā prācaran bodhi saṃbaram
etad puṇya viśuddha ātmā pariśuddha tri maṇḍalaḥ
aham bodhim samāsādya jina ātmajā bhave dhunā

original: iti vijñāya mānuṣyā vāñchanti ye sunirvṛtiṃ // SvayambhuP_10.111 //
analyzed: iti vijñāya mānuṣyāḥ vāñchanti ye su nirvṛtim

original: dharmadhātuṃ samārādhya bhajantu te sadā mudā /
analyzed: dharmadhātum samārādhya bhajantu te sadā mudā

original: smṛtvā dhyātvā ca nāmāpi samuccārya samādarāt // SvayambhuP_10.112 //
analyzed: smṛtvā dhyātvā ca nāma api samuccārya samādarāt
samālokya praṇatvā api bhajantu tam jinālayam

original: ye bhajanti sadā smṛtvā dhyātvā natvā jinālayaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.113 //
analyzed: ye bhajanti sadā smṛtvā dhyātvā natvā jinālayam
drutam saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddha padam āpnuyuḥ

original: iti satyaṃ samākhyātaṃ sarvairapi munīśvaraiḥ // SvayambhuP_10.114 //
analyzed: iti satyam samākhyātam sarvaiḥ api muni īśvaraiḥ
śrutvā anumodya tam dharmadhātum smṛtvā bhajantu alam
su bhāṣitam idam ye pi śrutvā anumodita āśayāḥ
dharmadhātum anusmṛtvā dhyātvā bhajanti sarvadā
te ca etad mahat puṇya pariśuddha tri maṇḍalāḥ
bhadra śrī sat guṇādhārāḥ catur brahma vihāriṇaḥ
bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ mahā abhijñāḥ śubha indriyāḥ
drutam saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddha padam āpnuyuḥ

original: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate // SvayambhuP_10.118 //
analyzed: iti me guruṇā ādiṣṭam śrutam mayā tathā ucyate
tvam api idam sadā śrāvayitvā anumodaya
etad puṇya anubhāvena sarvatra sarvadā api te
nirutpātam śubha utsāham bhavet nūnam narādhipaḥ

original: iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśoko nṛpo mudā // SvayambhuP_10.120 //
analyzed: iti tena arhatā ādiṣṭam śrutvā aśokaḥ nṛpaḥ mudā
tathā iti prativijñapya prābhyanandat sa pārṣadaḥ

original: tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokā niśamyaitatsubhāṣitaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.121 //
analyzed: tatas sarve te lokāḥ niśamya etat su bhāṣitam
anumodya mahā utsāhaiḥ saṃcerire śubhe sadā
tadā etat puṇya bhāvena sarvatra tatra sarvadā
nirutpātam śubha utsāham prāvarttata nirantaram

original: ityādiśya mahābhijño jayaśrīḥ sa mahāmatiḥ // SvayambhuP_10.123 //
analyzed: iti ādiśya mahā abhijñaḥ jayaśrīḥ sa mahāmatiḥ
sarvān stān sāṃdhikān paśyan punar evam samādiśat
yatrā idam dharmma sāṃkathyam prāvarttayet kalau api
bhāṣa itya śṛṇuyāt yaḥ ca śrāvayet yaḥ pracārayet

original: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalāḥ sadā // SvayambhuP_10.125 //
analyzed: eteṣām tatra sarveṣām saṃbuddhāḥ sakalāḥ sadā
kṛpā dṛṣṭyā samālokya prakuryuḥ bhadram ābhavam

original: sarvā pāramitā devyasteṣāṃ tatra sadā śivaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.126 //
analyzed: sarvā pāramitā devyaḥ teṣām tatra sadā śivam
kṛtvā saṃbodhi saṃbhāram pūrayeyuḥ yathākramam
sarve bodhisattvāḥ ca pratyekasugatāḥ api
arhantaḥ yoginaḥ teṣām prakuryuḥ maṅgalam sadā

original: sarve lokādhipāścāpi sarve cāpi maharṣayaḥ // SvayambhuP_10.128 //
analyzed: sarve loka adhipāḥ ca api sarve ca api mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: tatra teṣāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ kuryuḥ samīkṣya maṅgalaṃ /
analyzed: tatra teṣām hi sarveṣām kuryuḥ samīkṣya maṅgalam
sarve deva adhipāḥ ca api sarva daitya adhipāḥ api
tathā sarve pi gandharvāḥ sarva yakṣa adhipāḥ api
garuḍāḥ nāga rājāḥ ca kumbhāṇḍa adhīśvarāḥ api

original: samīkṣya sarvadā teṣāṃ rakṣāṃ kuryuḥ samantataḥ /
analyzed: samīkṣya sarvadā teṣām rakṣām kuryuḥ samantataḥ

original: sarvāśca mātṛkā devyaḥ sabhairavagaṇā api // SvayambhuP_10.131 //
analyzed: sarvāḥ ca mātṛkāḥ devyaḥ sa bhairava gaṇāḥ api

original: kṛtvā rakṣāṃ sadā teṣāṃ kuryurbhadraṃ samantataḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā rakṣām sadā teṣām kuryuḥ bhadram samantataḥ

original: sarve grahāśca tārāśca siddhā vidyādharā api // SvayambhuP_10.132 //
analyzed: sarve grahāḥ ca tārāḥ ca siddhāḥ vidyādharāḥ api
sādhyāḥ ca api sat ālokya teṣām kuryuḥ su maṅgalam
bhūta preta piśācāḥ ca duṣṭāḥ māra gaṇāḥ api

original: vīkṣya teṣāṃ prasannāste rakṣāṃ kuryuḥ sadā mudā /
analyzed: vīkṣya teṣām prasannāḥ te rakṣām kuryuḥ sadā mudā
svayambhu guṇa māhātmya sāṃkathyam yaḥ likhet mudā
tena api likhitam sarva mahāyāna su bhāṣitam
lekhāpitam ca yena idam dharmadhātu su bhāṣitam

original: tenāpi sakalaṃ sūtraṃ lekhāpitaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
analyzed: tena api sakalam sūtram lekhāpitam bhavet dhruvam

original: likhitaṃ cāpi yecedaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yathāvidhi // SvayambhuP_10.136 //
analyzed: likhitam ca api ye ca idam pratiṣṭhāpya yathāvidhi
śuddha sthāne gṛhe sthāpya pūjā aṅgaiḥ sarvadā arcitam

original: tenārhanto jināḥ sarve pratyekasugatā api // SvayambhuP_10.137 //
analyzed: tena arhantaḥ jināḥ sarve pratyeka sugatāḥ api
sa saṃghāḥ bodhisattvāḥ ca bhavanti pūjitāḥ khalu

original: yaścāpīdaṃ svayaṃ dhṛtvā parebhyo 'pi samādiśat // SvayambhuP_10.138 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca api idam svayam dhṛtvā parebhyaḥ samādiśat
bhāvayet satatam smṛtvā dhyātvā api praṇamet mudā

original: tasya sarvamunīndro hi pratyekasugatā api // SvayambhuP_10.139 //
analyzed: tasya sarva muni indraḥ hi pratyeka sugatāḥ api
arhantaḥ bodhisattvāḥ ca tuṣṭāḥ dadyuḥ samīhitam
yaḥ ca etad upadeṣṭāram sarvāḥ ca śrāvakān api
yathāvidhi sa samabhyarcya bhājanaiḥ samatoṣayet

original: tena sarve 'pi saṃbuddhāḥ pratyekasugatā api // SvayambhuP_10.141 //
analyzed: tena sarve saṃbuddhāḥ pratyekasugatāḥ api
arhantaḥ bhikṣavaḥ sarve yoginaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: bodhisattvāśca sarve 'pi vratino yatayo 'pi ca // SvayambhuP_10.142 //
analyzed: bodhisattvāḥ ca sarve vratinaḥ yatayaḥ ca
arcitāḥ bhojitāḥ tuṣṭāḥ bhaveyuḥ anumoditāḥ

original: kimevaṃ vahunoktena sarve buddhā munīśvarāḥ // SvayambhuP_10.143 //
analyzed: kim evam vahunā uktena sarve buddhāḥ muni īśvarāḥ
sarva āstārāḥ ca sarva saṃghāḥ jina ātmajāḥ

original: nityaṃ teṣāṃ kṛpā dṛṣṭayā samālokyānumoditāḥ // SvayambhuP_10.144 //
analyzed: nityam teṣām kṛpā dṛṣṭayā samālokya anumoditāḥ

original: rakṣāṃ vidhāya sarvatra varaṃ dadyuḥ samīhitaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.145 //
analyzed: rakṣām vidhāya sarvatra varam dadyuḥ samīhitam
sarve loka adhipāḥ ca api sarve sura adhipāḥ

original: rakṣāṃ kṛtvā varaṃ dadyusteṣāṃ saddharmasādhane // SvayambhuP_10.146 //
analyzed: rakṣām kṛtvā varam dadyuḥ teṣām saddharma sādhane
rājānaḥ sadā teṣām rakṣā kṛtvā anumoditāḥ
yathā abhivāñchitam da tvā pālayeyuḥ sadā ādarāt
mantriṇaḥ pi sadā teṣām sa amātya saciva anugāḥ
sa bhṛtya sainya bhaṭṭāḥ ca bhaveyuḥ hita kāriṇaḥ
sarve vaiśyāḥ ca sarva artha bharttāraḥ syuḥ suhṛd priyāḥ
śreṣṭi mahājanāḥ sarve bhaveyuḥ hita kāriṇaḥ
dviṣaḥ upi dāsa tām yāyuḥ dṛṣṭāḥ ca syuḥ hita āśayāḥ
evam anye api lokāḥ ca syuḥ maitra mānasāḥ
paśavaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ ca api sarva kīṭāḥ ca jantavaḥ

original: naiva teṣāṃ viruddhā syuḥ bhaveyurhitaśaṃsina // SvayambhuP_10.151 //
analyzed: na eva teṣām viruddhāḥ syuḥ bhaveyuḥ hita śaṃsinaḥ
evam sarvatra lokeṣu teṣām saddharma sādhinām

original: nirutpātaṃ śubhotsāhaṃ saumāṅgalyaṃ sadā bhavet // SvayambhuP_10.152 //
analyzed: nirutpātam śubha utsāham saumāṅgalyam sadā bhavet
evam bhadrataram puṇyam svayabhūṃbhavana udbhavam

original: natvā taṃ trijagannāthaṃ bhajadhvaṃ sarvadā mudā // SvayambhuP_10.153 //
analyzed: natvā tam trijagannātham bhajadhvam sarvadā mudā

original: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā smṛtvā dhyātvā samāhitāḥ /
analyzed: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā smṛtvā dhyātvā samāhitāḥ

original: nāmāpi ca samuccārya bhajanti śraddhayā sadā // SvayambhuP_10.154 //
analyzed: nāma api ca samuccārya bhajanti śraddhayā sadā
teṣām ratnāni su prasannāni sarvadā

original: kṛpā dṛṣṭayā samālokya kṛtvā deyuḥ sadā śubhaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.155 //
analyzed: kṛpā dṛṣṭayā samālokya kṛtvā deyuḥ sadā śubham
iti śāstra a samādiṣṭam jaya śriyā niśamyate

original: jineśvarī pramukhāḥ saṃghā sarve nandanprabodhitāḥ // SvayambhuP_10.156 //
analyzed: pramukhāḥ sarve nandan prabodhitāḥ
sarvāvatī sabhā sā api śrutvā etat saṃprasāditāḥ
tathā iti prativijñapya prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ
tatas te sakalāḥ lokāḥ samutthāya prasāditāḥ

original: jayaśriya sasaṃghaṃ taṃ natvā svasvāśramaṃ yayuḥ // SvayambhuP_10.158 //
analyzed: sa saṃgham tam natvā sva sva āśramam yayuḥ
tatra nityam upetya tya ṛddhyā sa saṃghaḥ sa jina ātmajā

original: snātvā sarveṣu tīrtheṣu dhṛtvā vrataṃ yathāvidhi // SvayambhuP_10.159 //
analyzed: snātvā sarveṣu tīrtheṣu dhṛtvā vratam yathāvidhi
tatas ṣṭau vīta rāgān ca devīm ca api khagānanām
pañcamāḥ devatāḥ ca api yathāvidhi samarccayan
tathā caitya
dharmādhātum samārādhya dhyātvā abhyarcya sadā abhajat
tadā etat puṇya bhāvena viṣaye tatra sarvadā
nirutpātam śubha utsāham prāvarttata samaṃtataḥ
tatas ca asau mahā abhijñā jayaśrīḥ sugata ātmajaḥ

original: sarvānstān sāṃdhikān paśyan punarevaṃ samādiśat // SvayambhuP_10.163 //
analyzed: sarvān stān sāṃdhikān paśyan punar evam samādiśat
yatra idam dharma sāṃkathyam pracāritam svayaṃbhuvaḥ
tatra ait puṇya bhāvena bhavatu sarvadā śubham
saṃbuddhāḥ tatra sarve pi pratyekasugatāḥ api

original: arhanto bodhisattvāśca kurvantu maṃṅgalaṃ sadā // SvayambhuP_10.165 //
analyzed: arhantaḥ bodhisattvāḥ ca kurvantu maṃṅgalam sadā
sarve loka adhipāḥ ca api sarve ca api mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: samālokya sadā tatra prakurvantu sumaṅgalaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.166 //
analyzed: samālokya sadā tatra prakurvantu su maṅgalam
kāle varṣantu meghāḥ ca bhūyāt śaśyavatī mahī

original: nirutpātaṃ subhikṣyaṃ ca bhavantu tatra sarvadā // SvayambhuP_10.167 //
analyzed: nirutpātam subhikṣyam ca bhavantu tatra sarvadā
rājā bhavatu dhārmmiṣṭhaḥ mantriṇaḥ nīti cāriṇaḥ
sarve lokāḥ su vṛttiṣṭhāḥ bhavantu dharma sādhinaḥ
sarve sattvāḥ samācārāḥ saṃbodhi vihita āśayāḥ

original: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā saṃcarantāṃ sadā śubhe // SvayambhuP_10.169 //
analyzed: triratna bhajanam kṛtvā saṃcarantām sadā śubhe
iti jayaśriyā ādiṣṭam śrutvā sarve sāṃdhikāḥ
evam astu iti prābhāṣya prābhyanandan prasāditāḥ
iti śrī dharmmadhātu svayambhu utpatti dharma māhātmya subhāṣita sūtram daśamaḥ adhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ

original: ye dharmmā hetuprabhāvā hetu steṣāṃ tathāgataḥ hyavadat /
analyzed: ye dharmmāḥ hetu prabhāvāḥ hetuḥ steṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evam vādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
śubham astu

original: deyadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyāyinaḥ śrīmatrudravarṇṇamahāvihārāvasthitaḥ paramopāsakaśrīśākyavaṃśodbhavaḥ śrīrāmānandena likhito 'gamat saṃpūrṇṇa
analyzed: deya dharmaḥ yam pravara mahā yāyinaḥ śrīmat rudravarṇṇa mahā vihāra avasthitaḥ parama upāsaka śrī śākya vaṃśa udbhavaḥ śrī rāmānandena likhitaḥ gamat saṃpūrṇṇa
śubham astu sarva dāḥ

original: cāṣāḍhe kṣīnacandre tu pañcamyāñca tithau śubhe // 1 //
